AI Description: The 'GenomicRanges' package provides efficient containers for storing, manipulating, and annotating genomic range data. It defines general purpose containers for representing genomic annotations along a chromosome. It also provides efficient operations to extract and manipulate portions of a chromosome based on range queries.
Core Features: Efficient Storage Of Genomic Range Data, Annotation Of Genomic Features, Manipulation & Extraction Of Genomic Ranges, Support For Operations Based On Range Queries
General Tags: Genomics, Bioinformatics, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
